title: Sentences Only League Players Will Understand
body:
Write one sentence in the comments below that only League of Legends players will understand. **The one with the most upvotes wins!**

Edit: If you want your comments to be seen on the front page you should upvote this post.

replies.body: "and yet graves can't have a cigar"

> [{quoted}](name=AgeOfTheMage,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0eAq8YR0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-30T20:01:07.038+0000)
>
> "and yet graves can't have a cigar"

HE VAPES!
Sadly, many League players don't even get this.
I told some players that was the number one rule of league. They responded with "the number one rule is I can do whatever I want" and proceeded to chase singed. They died.
"I main Urgot." Oh wait. League players don't understand that either. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Furor Nexis,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0eAq8YR0,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-11-30T20:01:39.431+0000)
>
> "My teammates made me lose."

I thought this was universal in all games?

?

He's a ranged champion, he has to last hit it. He gets no early execution.
Hey now, I actually think people are dumb enough to think it's a bug.

You toxic scripting piece of bronze go back to playing with bots.

I'll gank bot after blue if the adc has summoner spells left.

You boosted bonobo why are you playing in high elo if you have flash on D.
Wait that doesn't make sense. They've already proved having flash on D is more beneficial.

"Better nerf Irelia"

"I am going to **BEAT** _League Of Legends_"

"I'm not an ass, I'm a Yasuo main."

(Vayne) signals that an enemy is missing.
(Vayne) signals that an enemy is missing.
(Vayne) signals that an enemy is missing.
(Vayne) signals that an enemy is missing.
(Vayne) signals that an enemy is missing.

"An ally has been slain"
 (Yasuo) Trash bot no ss gg

"An Ally has been Slain"
"An Ally has Disconnected"
"Defeat"

''Oh look, it's Singed! Let's chase him!''

''Huh, Fiora got a Quadrakill... Better nerf Irelia.''

''Man this champion is so bad, it's basically getting Olaf'd.''

''Weedwick 4.20 patch... Runeglaive mid Ezreal... Udyr/Master Yi Bloodrazor.''

''Tons of Damage.'' (whenever you read it in your head, you always hear Phreak saying it.)

''Rest in peace, Dominion.''

> [{quoted}](name=IsmokeOregano,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0eAq8YR0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-30T19:58:51.566+0000)
>
> "gank"

I like this sentence you have here.

2nd most heard sentence a jungler can hear.

Only behind "WHAT WAS THAT SMITE?"
I died so X has no counterplay.
Why does nobody have a frozen heart?

I AM THE CANTANKEROUS CAVALIER, THE GREAT HUSSAR, THE HIGH GENERAL MARSHAL SERGEANT, THE MOUNTAIN ADMIRAL, LORD COLONEL MAJOR CENTURION, REAR FORWARD BRIGADIER ADMIRAL, FORWARD ADMIRAL MAJOR, SIR ADMIRAL MAJOR, LIEUTENANT SERGEANT COMMODORE, SERGEANT GENERAL COLONEL, SERGEANT DOUBLE ADMIRAL, HIGH MAJOR COMMODORE OF THE FIRST LEGION THIRD MULTIPLICATION DOUBLE ADMIRAL ARTILLERY VANGUARD COMPANY, AND LORD MAJOR ADMIRAL OF THE SECOND LEGION'S FORWARD ARTILLERY-CAVALRY MULTIPLICATION AND YOU WILL SALUTE WHEN YOU SPEAK TO ME!
when will matchmaking ever find balance.

_Yeah, that was a banana !_ **giggles** _No one expects the banana._

{{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:16}}

"Aatrox? Who's that? Is that the new champion or something?"

"Nah, it's Galio."

"WHO?!"
"Sorry im not doing good guys, im high/drunk"
